li.label: Electric Power
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} channels the raw force of a thunderstorm, delivering lightning-fast attacks that crackle with power. {PAWN_pronoun}'s strikes bypass defenses, like lightning splitting the sky.

li.label: Lightning Reflexes
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves with the speed and unpredictability of a thunderstrike, reacting in the blink of an eye. {PAWN_pronoun} dodges and strikes with the force of an electric storm.

li.label: Stormcaller's Bond
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} commands the elements with the strength of a storm, drawing animals to {PAWN_possessive} side with the raw power of nature. {PAWN_pronoun} bends beasts to {PAWN_possessive} will as thunder commands the sky.

li.label: Storm's Persistence
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} endures pain and hardship with the resilience of a thunderstorm. Like the storm that never ceases, {PAWN_pronoun} fights on through exhaustion and suffering, unyielding.

li.label: Stormborn Shield
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} draws strength from the storm, unshaken by toxins and filth. Like a shield of lightning, {PAWN_pronoun} endures, emerging from battle unharmed and unbroken.

li.label: Electrified Dishes
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} uses the crackling power of lightning in the kitchen, creating dishes that are infused with electric energy. {PAWN_pronoun} ensures every meal is charged with vitality and power.

li.label: Crackling Dominance
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} commands the room with an undeniable presence, radiating power like a thunderclap. {PAWN_pronoun}'s aura instills both fear and respect, drawing others to {PAWN_possessive} side.

li.label: Stormcaller's Care
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} heals with the fierce energy of a storm, restoring vitality with the speed and intensity of a lightning strike. {PAWN_pronoun} ensures that no ally falls to the storm's chaos.

li.label: Storm's Fertility
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} understands the balance of destruction and creation, fostering growth and renewal like the nourishing rains of a storm. {PAWN_pronoun} brings new life wherever {PAWN_pronoun} treads, much like the storm rejuvenates the earth.
